Reviews.Title: Grandstream GXV305 works great
Reviews.Author: Peter H Huda
Reviews.Content: Only problem was not with unit, but getting the software link dose not work that was given to download soft ware. had to search internet to get it.That's why I gave it only 4 stars should have software included.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Analog video  inputs (BNC) and 4 alarm input & outputs
Audio input and output, RS485/232, PTZ control
24MB pre-/post-event recording buffer per port
Integrated Power-over-Ethernet (802.3af), optional antenna for wireless network
SIP/VoIP support for two-way audio communications and video streaming to mobile phones and video phones
ProductInfo.Name: Grandstream GXV3504 IP Video Encoder
